import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ReservationService } from '../reservation/reservation.service'; import { ReservationModule } from '../reservation/reservation.module'; import { OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Reservation } from '../model/reservation'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reservation-list', templateUrl: './reservation-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reservation-list.component.css'], }) export class ReservationListComponent implements OnInit { reservations: Reservation[] = []; constructor(private reservationService: ReservationService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.reservations = this.reservationService.getReservations(); } deleteReservation(id: string) { this.reservationService.deleteReservation(id); } }
